description:
Currently living in the beautiful South Of France, a region of Europe where the sun shines 300 days a year.

The beaches and the mountains are both gorgeous depending on the seasons.

I like to work out, biking, enjoy restaurants, cinemas, exotic romantic weekends, international trips, lazying around at times but also on another side, a fan of yoga, meditation, spirituality and good books.
Witty and eager to live and discover new exciting heart pounding experiences together !

Come over whenever you wish for long beach strolls, mountaineering, sports, hot sea water spas, jacuzzis...
I'd be most happy to welcome you in my beautiful region, make you visit places and taste original wines, food and have a relaxing time.

We can also go to other interesting places on our beautiful planet to discover and taste more.
